body:
MCP (Model Context Protocol) Integration

This release introduces native MCP server support, enabling AI assistants to directly query and analyze your multi-cloud infrastructure inventory through a standardized protocol.

New Features
- MCP Server Mode: New --mcp flag enables kollect to run as an MCP server
- AI Assistant Integration: Direct integration with Claude, VS Code Copilot, and other MCP-compatible AI tools
- Real-time Inventory Queries: AI assistants can now query live infrastructure data across AWS, Azure, GCP, and Kubernetes
- Enhanced Workflow: Seamless infrastructure analysis and cost optimization through natural language queries
Usage

`kollect --inventory all --mcp`

Configure in your MCP client (e.g., VS Code settings) to enable AI-powered infrastructure insights and automated analysis of your cloud resources, costs, and compliance status.
